column5: Has anyone fished Tunnel Lake or visited Camp Kuha ?It's about an hour and one half northeast of Sault Ste. Marie,and from the Camp's website, looks like a nice lake/location.Am considering either a fall trip in the next few weeks or a summer trip next year.If you've been up to the Lake, any information on the fishingwould be appreciated, as well as any your thoughts on this camp.Thanks
Anyone know of this new lodge or Lake Tunnel ?Thanks
